sentences: Andy Hess (born December 4, 1966) is an American bassist and former member of Gov't Mule, having joined the band in 2003.
Previously, he was The Black Crowes' bassist from February 2001 until their hiatus early the following year.
Hess is currently touring with Steve Kimock.
He performed on The John Scofield's Band albums Up All Night which was released in 2003 and Ãœberjam Deux which was released in 2013.
